✅ HIGHEST STANDARDS IN TOYS: Meeting U.S. safety standards of ASTM F963-17, Doctor Jupiter ensures high-quality science kits. With premium equipment and comprehensive manuals, we guarantee a perfect experience or a 100% refund, no questions asked.

name: Playnovate Tornado in a Bottle STEM Kit | Weather Science Toy for Kids | Includes QR Code for Expert-Led Tutorials | Birthday Gifts for Boys & Girls Age 8,9,10,11, 12 Years
short_description: WATER VORTEX SCIENCE KIT​ Build a mesmerizing motorized tornado in a bottle using magnetic forces—watch as spinning water demonstrates centripetal motion in action! This hands-on weather science experiment transforms abstract physics into a captivating visual demonstration, perfect for budding meteorologists.

NO COMPLICATED SETUP​ Our self-contained vortex maker requires just 2 AA batteries (not included) to start experimenting. Kids ages 6+ can adjust magnet positions to modify vortex intensity, learning about force and motion through immediate visual feedback—no additional tools or assembly required!

DIGITAL BONUS: ONLINE WEATHER LAB​ Scan the QR code to access professional STEM videos. Educators guide young scientists through vortex physics, real tornado formation, and storm safety tips—connecting your bottle experiment to atmospheric science concepts used by professional storm chasers.

THE PERFECT GIFT FOR KIDS This ready-to-use science kit comes in storm-themed packaging that sparks excitement from the moment it’s opened. More than just a demonstration tool, it creates engaging opportunities for families to explore extreme weather phenomena together through safe, hands-on experimentation. Featuring a shatterproof plastic bottle and non-toxic materials for worry-free play, its contained water system prevents spills—making it ideal for both classroom demonstrations and home science labs.
EVERYTHING INCLUDED (EXCEPT BATTERIES) High-torque DC motor system Multiple neodymium magnet shapes (rod & discs) Easy-assemble foam frame with water chamber Detailed step-by-step manual

name: Tornado Maker, Bottle to Bottle Transfer Connectors, 2pc Clear Bottles, No Leak, Tornados Toys for Kids, Weather Science Experiment Toy
short_description: Unique cyclone tube: Made of ultra-light aviation aluminum, with clear anti-slip texture on the surface, unique anti-injury design, and hard connecting tube that can better connect to 1 liter, 2 liter and other larger capacity bottles (to connect other bottles, you need to remove the small plastic ring on the bottle mouth to prevent leakage).

Tornado in a bottle: Connect tubing to a bottle that's about two-thirds full of water and another empty bottle. Shake the bottle horizontally 4-5 times until you see a vortex inside. This is the tornado in a bottle. You can also add coloring or laundry detergent to the water to create tornadoes with different colors or bubbles for a more interesting experiment.
Tornado Kit: 1 Tornado connector, 2 transparent plastic bottles with scales, 2 leak-proof water rings (built into the connecting tube), 1 Tornado instruction manual, and 1 gift box.
Tornado toy: Suitable for teaching, family learning, experiments and group activities. It is a good prop to cultivate children's scientific literacy, prevention of natural disasters and self-rescue.
Water Vortex Cyclone Tube: A CPC-compliant scientific toy, packaged in an exquisite gift box, perfect for gift giving. It's a great gift for birthdays, awards, Christmas, and other holidays.

name: Thames & Kosmos Weather & Climate Lab STEM Experiment Kit, 5-in-1 Weather & Meteorology Station w/Wind Vane, Compass, Rain Gauge, Anemometer & Thermometer for Ages 6+, Includes Stake for Outdoor Use
short_description: This compact, 5-in-1 weather station provides the tools to investigate specific weather phenomena and Earth’s climate system in general.
Efficient design includes a durable stake to secure the weather station into the ground or to a pole outside for real-time measurements.
Built-in tools include: wind vane, compass, rain gauge, anemometer (wind speed indicator), and thermometer to monitor, observe, and record weather data.

The 32-page, full-color manual guides young scientists through hands-on experiments to investigate a variety of topics including air pressure and temperature, the water cycle, the atmosphere, wind, and more.
Encourages and develops observation and note-taking skills while promoting a sense of responsibility for our planet, nature, and the environment.
product_description: Calling all meteorologists-in-training! This compact, 5-in-1 weather station provides the tools to investigate specific weather phenomena and Earth’s climate system in general. Using the five unique attachments, you can execute a variety of climate-related experiments to get a firsthand look at why the weather is one of the most popular topics of conversation and scientific study. Install this sleek weather station outdoors and use the built-in wind vane, compass, rain gauge, anemometer (wind speed indicator), and thermometer to measure weather data. The manual takes young scientists through eight hands-on experiments and includes pages to record observations. Bonus: Supplemental experiments using household experiments available online!

name: Thames & Kosmos Wind Power V5.0 STEM Experiment Kit, Build a 3ft-Tall Model Wind Turbine & Explore Clean, Renewable Energy, Optimized for Use Outdoors & Indoors, Experiments & Discovery for Ages 8+
short_description: FIFTH-GENERATION WIND TURBINE KIT: Updated version of the best-selling STEM kit about wind power and energy, kids can make their own wind turbine to explore this renewable energy source.
OPTIMIZED FOR INDOOR & OUTDOOR USE: Design includes a new blade hub and gear ratio to enhance performance in outdoor wind and with indoor fan setups.
WHAT YOU LEARN: Dive into the technology behind one of the most promising sources of clean energy, how it has been used it the past, and how it is used today.
INCLUDES ELECTRIC MODEL CAR: Use your turbine to generate and store electricity to power a model car in just two minutes—no batteries required!
GUIDED JOURNEY THROUGH WIND POWER: The 32-page, full-color manual provides illustrated step-by-step assembly instructions and easy-to-understand explanations about the scientific concepts at work.
product_description: Wind is one of the most promising sources of clean, renewable energy available today. With this kit, you can assemble a realistic wind turbine complete with electric generator and adjustable rotor blades designed with complex aerodynamic curves to look and work like modern-day wind turbine blades. Experiment with the integrated hand crank to feel energy generation in your hands. Conduct experiments to optimize the turbine’s performance by adjusting the angle of the blades and discover how to use the wind turbine to light up an LED. Quickly charge an electric capacitor to power a sleek electric car and demonstrate a tangible application for the stored electricity. The full-color, 32-page manual offers illustrated instructions and scientific information that explores the different types of wind turbines and windmills, the history of this technology, and how wind energy can be used to power homes and electric cars.
